markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Elemental, Air](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=408)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 140 <sup>1.1</sup>

Hailing from the [Plane of Air](/Planes.aspx?ID=29), these beings appear in a variety of sizes and shapes. They're noted for being elusive, swift, and often difficult to detect due to being composed primarily of air.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Elemental Hurricane](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2976) (Creature 11), [Living Whirlwind](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2974) (Creature 5), [Phade](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2975) (Creature 7), [Zephyr Hawk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2973) (Creature 3)

<title level="2" right="Creature Family Group">Elemental</title>

**Related Families**
[Elemental, Air](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=41), [Elemental, Earth](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=42), [Elemental, Earth](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=409), [Elemental, Fire](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=43), [Elemental, Fire](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=410), [Elemental, Mephit](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=44), [Elemental, Metal](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=343), [Elemental, Scamp](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=411), [Elemental, Water](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=45), [Elemental, Water](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=412), [Elemental, Wisp](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=232), [Elemental, Wood](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=345)
name: Elemental, Air
